snippet: Representative Michele Bachmann reappears on television in Iowa with a 30-second ad that comes just in time for Tuesday's caucuses.
abstract: Representative Michele Bachmann reappears on television in Iowa with a 30-second ad that comes just in time for Tuesday's caucuses.
lead_paragraph: DES MOINES - Representative Michele Bachmann hasn't been on the air in Iowa with a television commercial since August when she surprised the country by placing first in the state's straw poll. But she reappeared on Monday with a 30-second spot that comes just in time for the caucuses on Tuesday.
